raw_text:
MENUS AND DISPLAYS Embraer Legacy 450/500 and Praetor 500/600 PFD Menu Pro Line Fusion® Avionics

The HSI Map displays FMS information. For more information on the FMS Map data and FMS ﬂight plans, refer to the Embraer Legacy 450/500 Flight Management System Operator’s Guide (CPN 523-0818863).
